mediaConfiguration.altText: Web Application development is hard - Why choose SSW

cards.heading: Reduce Risk on Complex Projects
cards.description: We mitigate uncertainty through transparent Scrum processes, rigorous testing, and deep architectural planning, ensuring predictable outcomes for demanding builds.

cards.heading: Solve Challenges Off-the-Shelf Software Can't
cards.description: When standard solutions fall short, we build custom web apps, APIs, and LOB systems from scratch, tailored precisely to your unique operational needs.

cards.heading: Elite Microsoft Stack Expertise
cards.description: Leverage our 30+ years of .NET & Azure experience, top-tier talent (MVPs, RDs), and direct Microsoft connections for superior solutions.

blocks.heading: Transforming Hearing Support for Children Worldwide
blocks.description: [The Shepherd Centre](https://shepherdcentre.org.au/) excels at helping children with hearing loss, but paper forms and separate records limited how many families they could reach. They worked with us to build ["HearHub"](https://hearhub.org/), an online system bringing their proven assessment tools together. This made tracking a child's progress clearer and freed up staff time, tripling their capacity to support families.

features.heading: You need the data to understand the right level of support... [HearHub] will make a huge difference worldwide, not just for us here in Australia.
features.description: - Jim Hungerford, CEO, The Shepherd Centre

mediaConfiguration.altText: Helping Deaf Children Reach Their Full Potential | SSW Case Study

blocks.heading: Tech wisdom from the trenches
blocks.body: At SSW, weâ€™ve been knee-deep in projects for years: debugging giant solutions, fixing game-stopping bugs, and staying on the cutting edge. No guesswork, just proven tips that help you build better software.

cards.heading: Ditch the Mocks: Test Like Production with Containers (MSSQL, SMTP, Azurite)
cards.description: Discover how using real services in Docker containers (MSSQL, SMTP, Azurite) via Testcontainers for .NET delivers robust integration tests and eliminates production surprises.

cards.altText: Why Everyone is Choosing Next.JS & the Best Headless UI Library
cards.heading: Why Everyone is Choosing Next.JS & the Best Headless UI Library
cards.description: This session introduces Next.js and shadcn/UI, modern web development tools that simplify creating sleek and responsive websites. Join SSW's Jack Pettit for a beginner-friendly demo covering practical tips to supercharge your projects.

cards.altText: Unlocking Domain-Driven Design: Exploring Contextive | Gert Marx & Chris Simon
cards.heading: Building Cross-platform Blazor Desktop Apps with Photino
cards.description: Explore Photino, the lightweight way to build native-feeling desktop apps with Blazor. See how it compares to MAUI/Electron & watch a quickstart demo.

cards.altText: Vercel - Development with Zero Config | Tylah Kapa
cards.heading: Vercel - Development with Zero Config
cards.description: Vercel simplifies website deployment with GitHub integration, real-time editing, and scalable infrastructure. It's free to start and ideal for projects of any size. See Tylah's demo for a hands-on look.

accordionItems.label: What types of web applications and APIs does SSW specialize in building?
accordionItems.content: SSW specializes in building complex, custom web applications and APIs from the ground up. This includes CRM systems, ERP systems, line-of-business applications, customer portals, intranets, and mobile applications. We thrive on challenging projects that push the boundaries of technology
